marketing.vinted_title: Your Vinted photos reveal your address.
marketing.vinted_text_1: Every photo taken with your iPhone or Android embeds your exact GPS coordinates, date and time, and your phone model.
marketing.vinted_text_2: When a buyer asks for "more photos" via WhatsApp, they get everything.
marketing.vinted_text_3: Clean your photos before posting. GhostMeta removes all metadata in one click, directly in your browser. Nothing is sent to the internet.
marketing.batch_lock_desc: In free mode, clean photos one by one (unlimited). The Pro Pack unlocks batch processing and ZIP export.

info.why_desc: Every smartphone photo contains invisible metadata. When you post on Vinted, eBay or Depop, this data can reveal your exact address, habits, and equipment.
info.geo_desc: Exact home coordinates embedded in every smartphone photo.
info.meta_desc: Dates and times revealing your presence and absence routines.
info.hard_desc: Device model, lens, and serial numbers identifying your equipment.
info.how_subtitle: Three steps. Zero upload. Your photos stay on your device.
info.step_1_desc: Drag & drop or select your images. JPEG, PNG, WebP and HEIC supported.
info.step_2_desc: GhostMeta analyzes every image and identifies sensitive metadata (GPS, date, device).
info.step_3_desc: One click to remove all metadata. Download your clean images.
info.arch_subtitle: Your photos never leave your device. All processing is done locally in your browser.
info.q1: Are my photos sent to a server?
info.a1: No. All processing happens locally in your browser via WebAssembly.
info.a2: We support JPEG, PNG, WEBP, and HEIC.
info.a3: Everything: GPS, EXIF, XMP, IPTC, and embedded thumbnails.
info.a4: No, the image is cleaned without destructive re-compression.
info.a5: To support development while keeping the tool ad-free.
info.a6: Not always, and often only after storing the original on their servers.
